title: Top Iranian envoy warns 'preemptive action' against Israel expected soon

title: FBI crime statistics show anti-LGBTQ hate crimes on the rise
description: Anti-LGBTQ hate crimes rose sharply in 2022, jumping more than 19 percent over 2021, according to the FBI’s annual crime report released Monday. title: Is crime going up in America? Some types are, new FBI data shows
description: A massive data dump of 11 million criminal offenses reported to the FBI paints a complicated picture of crime in the United States. The data, released Monday, shows that while violent crime dropped nationwide in 2022, property crime jumped.

title: Supreme Court again intervenes for Biden administration on 'ghost guns'
description: The Supreme Court on Monday intervened a second time so the Biden administration can enforce its regulation on so-called ghost guns after the administration accused lower courts of countermanding the justices’ authority. title: 21 species across 16 states now considered extinct: US wildlife officials
description: Nearly two dozen species from 16 states that were listed as endangered have been delisted — but not because they've rebounded.

title: What the Rite Aid bankruptcy filing means for customers, prescriptions
description: The Rite Aid Corporation has filed for bankruptcy protection in order to reduce the company’s sizable debt and restructure. The move, announced Sunday, comes amid Rite Aid’s ongoing financial challenges, including those posed by opioid-related lawsuits.

title: Should colleges and universities speak on political issues?

title: Why blue hydrogen is a big mistake
description: Federal decision-makers must not waste time sinking taxpayer dollars into attempts to bolster speculative ventures for blue hydrogen, a fuel that is not clean and not a solution. Time is running out.

title: 40% won't tip at food trucks – but should you?
